product_overview: Next.js User Workspace Platform is a web application designed to provide users with a comprehensive authenticated workspace that includes profile management, community engagement, marketplace, messaging, and ticketing functionalities. Built with React, TypeScript, and Supabase backend, it offers a seamless experience for user interaction and management.
core_goals: Provide secure and reliable user authentication including login, signup, and verification.
Offer users a personalized workspace dashboard to manage their activities efficiently.
Enable users to manage and edit their profiles easily.
Facilitate community interactions and engagement between users.
Support marketplace transactions for items or services within the platform.
Allow users to send and receive messages within the app securely.
Implement a ticketing system for support or task management.
key_features: User Authentication flows: login, signup, and verification.
Global Navigation and footer components for consistent UI.
Workspace dashboard for main user activities.
Profile management pages with view and edit capabilities.
Community page to engage with others in the platform.
Marketplace page for listing and browsing items or services.
Tickets interface for managing support or task tickets.
Reusable UI components including buttons, inputs, cards, dialogs, avatars, and forms for consistency and scalability.
Supabase integration for authentication, database, and server-side utilities.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in through the authentication pages.
Upon successful authentication, user is redirected to the workspace dashboard.
User navigates via the global navbar to profile, community, marketplace, messages, or tickets pages as needed.
User can edit their profile via the profile edit page and save changes.
User can browse and interact in the community section.
User can list or purchase items/services in the marketplace.
User communicates with others through the messaging interface.
User creates or manages tickets in the ticketing system.
validation_criteria: All authentication flows (login, signup, verification) must be fully functional and secure.
Workspace dashboard must load user-specific data correctly and be responsive.
Profile management must allow viewing and updating profile information reliably.
Community, marketplace, messages, and tickets sections must display and handle data accurately.
UI components must render correctly across all pages with consistent styling.
Supabase integration must handle all backend operations such as authentication and data storage without errors.
Navigation between pages must be smooth and maintain user session state.
Forms and user input must be validated and errors gracefully handled.
